Dead by Daylight is a game that is mainly focused on the cosmetics.
The "Dedicated Servers" are killer favor. Let me explain, if you vault through a window or a pallet and then the killer swings, on your screen he didn't hit you but on his screen he did hit you and then the game decides to take the killer point of view rather then the survivor one which I kinda understand but not when he is too far away from me, and lets not talk about huntress hatchets which are completly bs. When you are in a lobby it can show you 70 Ping (really low ping) but the gameplay itself is like you are running at 110-150 ping so think twice before trying to vault a window.

This could've been a great game but unfortunately the devs  don't actually care about the community. This is why many players can only look at the game in the library and not play the game thanks to the dx11 error. The devs simply removed the OS which had that problem from the supported system requirements. Good job devs.

This game is one of my favorite games of all time however im downvoting it because of its recent update allowing access into Asia.

Its quite commonly known for Asian servers/players to ruin gaming communities (ARK:Survival Evolved as the #1 example).

Unless there is a specific region lockout one day planned for this game, this will probably be one of my last times playing.

Premetto che questo √® il mio secondo account, dato che il mio primo √® stato bannato per via del save file che ho deciso di mettere dopo aver perso per la seconda volta il salvataggio che avevo. Questo gioco STA MORENDO! Ed √® tutta colpa degli sviluppatori che non si danno da fare a risolvere i problemi di questo videogioco. Bug, glitch, hacker che non vengono bannati, perk che continuano ad essere nerfati o buffati senza alcun motivo. E detto sinceramente questi killer presi da film HANNO SCASSATO LA M****A. Create un concept vostro invece di utilizzare personaggi gi√† "fatti". So bene che le collab con gli sviluppatori dei film vi danno gran guadagno, ma i capitoli dei killer "reali" sono stati tutti dei FLOP! (Eccetto il primo, quello di myers, dato che era una novit√†). Per non parlare della community che √® tolalmente popolata da persone di m***a, gente che facecampera senza motivo, tbagga ad ogni pallet e insulta a fine partita... La situazione degenera e dbd continua ad essere il mio gioco preferito nonostante tutto. Spero che tra un anno non finisca nel dimenticatoio perch√® ci rimarrei male. Fate QUALCOSA!

I think we did a pretty good job so far.

So after 100h+ of playtime in this game if decided to do a short review.

First of all Dead by Daylight is a great idea of a game.

so far i had moments were i couldnt stop cryin for how much fun i have playing with my friends.
But on the othere side there is the fact that Killer and Teammates can ruin this fun so easy, im not mentioning the facecamping stuff right here, every one who played atleast 10h in this game knows what i am talking about. 

So if you got atleast 1-2 buddys with you can have so much fun in here, but after all its for sure a challenging and hard to play game if you want to get up there at the higher places, but when you got there you will enjoy it even more.

I would recomend this games after all even after, what feelt like 10-15h beind camped.

The game is really good. Lots of mechanics for the survivors and also the killers are not bad either. Excepting some bugs here and there the game is becomming better and better. Great job devs!

The worst thing about this game is that it has a TREMENDOUS potential, but is making really small steps into nowhere. I hope this game doesn't die because it is for sure a lot of fun AND one of the best asymmetrical multiplayer game out on steam. It is difficult to get used to it, both as survivor and killer, but it can give a lot of hour of great fan and never makes you feel bad. At least, not if you want a product already finished and served. It always has this aura of beta-ness, which is kinda sad. Do buy this and make DbD great again. Hope to see you in the fog.

When I first saw this game I though "It ain't anything special", but after watching a plethora of gameplay videos and streams I grew to be quite fond of the game which has lead me to purchase it. I've spent about 230 hours playing this game so far, but when I look at it now and the state it is in.... It just makes me frown in disappointment becosue of the balance issues at higher ranks. Even though I am not pleased with how the devs are treating this game, I still cannot bring myself to give it a negative review. Dead by Daylight has earned a special place in my heart and I still have hope for it to earn back it's glory and not becoming the next EVOLVE.
